# The Water Cycle 

  Water is essential for our lives. The water cycle connects many components of Earth's climate system and plays a significant role in transporting heat around the planet. This is location based

slides.altText: In 2010, Queensland experienced the wettest December on record, leading to a prolonged period of extensive flooding.

## Global Mean Sea Level 

 The global sea level observed by satellites shows an upward trend of 3.3 mm per year, but a decline in 2011 due to the large amount of excess water on land.
